name: Tappy Dig Deluxe
description:
A perfectly normal clicker game! Click the giant rock to start gaining Ore. Spend it on upgrades, unlock new diggers, research different Ore types... the world is yours!

Features:

  • 12 subsystems that interact with each other for a deep and immersive clicker experience!
  • Two prestige mechanics to completely reset your progress, but let you reach newer heights!
  • Mini-games! Try to set a high-score, and earn rewards as you do it!
  • Achievements! Unlock the Runes system to earn a massive Ore generation bonus. 

Don't look at the moon.

---

A couple of years ago I started making games in Scratch to amuse my students. The culmination of that was Tappy Dig, a weird, creepy clicker game I made naively and poorly. I wanted to take another stab at it to polish it up the way it deserved - hence, Tappy Dig Deluxe.
